overview: Stepmoms sure have changed! No more eveil stereotype; today's stepmom is sexy, horny and down to do anything to make her stepson happy! Not only does she want to be a shoulder to lean on, she wants to be the safe, warm place her young stepson dreams of sliding his hard cock into!
tagline: When it comes to stepmoms, some guys have all the fuck!
title: Mommy's Boy 4
